remarks: Distribute proper substitution through a subclass relation.  This theorem was automatically derived from ~ sbcssgVD .  (Contributed by Alan Sare, 22-Jul-2012.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: sbcssOLD $p |- ( A e. B -> ( [. A / x ]. C C_ D <-> [_ A / x ]_ C C_ [_ A / x ]_ D ) ) $.
